headline: Media Advisory: HII’s Newport News Shipbuilding to Christen Arkansas (SSN 800)
summary: NEWPORT NEWS, Va., Dec. 02, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- What:HII’s Newport News Shipbuilding (NNS) division will christen the Virginia-class submarine Arkansas (SSN 800) on Saturday, Dec. 7.This event is NOT open to the public but will be livestreamed: www.HII.com/SSN800. Media members are invited to the event and to visit the site Friday, Dec. 6 in advance of the ceremony.
